content.detailedDescription: I was driving east bound on the i-215 freeway in salt lake just before the highland drive exit. i witnessed an extremely bright sphere shaped object that appeared to be hovering over the freeway. the center of the sphere appeared colorless (grey). the perimeter of the sphere was surrounded by what looked like a very bright purplish almost led like glow. it stood out from anything else. i have never seen anything like it and don't know what it was. my first reaction was "wtf is that!" there is no way it was a normal helicopter or airplane. the light surrounding the sphere was solid and did not flash. i was able to witness it for a minute then my car passed underneath it. i was able to catch one last glance in my driver side mirror. it seemed much lower elevation than the normal planes fly over at. i would say it was more like a helicopter elevation or somewhere between. there was no wind, clouds or any other weather factors tonight. the sky was very clear and you could see more stars than normal in the city.
content.summary: Bright purplish colored sphere hovering over i-215 east freeway

content.detailedDescription:
While filling gas at the local station i witnessed in the sky three red blinking lights were first observed in a straight line from right to left.. in front of them were three bright white lights in the same exact distance and pattern from the red ones.. object(s) were moving from west to east and flying towards me.. unable to judge height or distance in the air as it was dark with a few stars showing but being over the town the building lights were making it harder to see. the object(s) were moving slowly towards me and off to my left. i called over a local official who was across the street and he witnessed them as well and was not able to identify them either. we then watched them change pattern and closed formation and moved more towards the south.. after about 2 minutes they again changed pattern to where they were flying end to end (white/ red, white/red and white/red) and began moving in a easterly direction again. we observed them for about another 2 minutes until they moved out of our view. the official then got into his vehicle and followed them. unknown what he found after that.

these object(s) were in a square, diamond, and rectangle and then in a straight line pattern while maintaining the uniformity in all patterns… also noted was there was absolutely no sound.

no pictures were taken but 5 sketches have been drawn as best as i can remember. 

my first thought was ufo.. and still is now.. there have been no known military operations around here. no strange aircraft have ever been noted in daylight hours before either that i am aware of.

weather:  about 28 degrees, clear skies with some stars, some light haze at first when noticed the object then it moved into clearer skies.
content.summary: 6 lights seen in the sky shanging shapes but moving in uniformity pattern

content.detailedDescription: It was on 1/22/15 around 7am my husband and i were heading down in 14  east towards fort wayne, indiana.  between the county line of kosciusko and whitley county. i was watching the fields off to the right looking for deer. i noticed a green light in the sky.  i didn't think nothing of it until we passed a large areas of trees and was wide open to some fields.   not really moving fast just a steady moving.  it was above the large powers line but lower than the clouds.   at first i thought it was a plane but the longer i looked at it the less it had the attributes of a plane.  there was no blinking lights. no red or white lights.  i thought how strange that a plane so low in the sky.  as my husband drove on, he asked what i was staring at. i explained to him a green object in the sky.  he kinda poked down and looked over, as we kept driving down in14 i watched it slowly glide across the sky behind us.  a few hours later on the ride home  we passed the same field and we looked around thinking a tower of some sort or lights on top of the power lines but we could see nothing.  just a house and power lines then open fields.  i'm not sure what we saw. it just seemed a little odd to me.
content.summary: Green object in sky.

content.detailedDescription:
As i was heading west over the williamsburg bridge into manhattan, i saw a relatively large box-like object moving very slowly in a southernly direction.  from distance and size it seemed to be over the hudson river and in the proximity 20's-40's streets of manhattan.  approximately the same latitude of the empire state building.  there was heavy low cloud cover, and the object did not appear to be higher than the empire state building.  at first, it looked like a prop-plane with a sign behind it angled towards my direction and maybe flying against the wind.  you see them advertising over the hudson, but not usually during winter and with cloud cover.  but, i could not see a plane at the front.  there was normal helicopter traffic, and there is a heliport on the west side highway of manhattan in the area where this object would have been flying over.  i'm reporting this, because somebody else had to have seen this thing if it was a real object.  

i watch the skies over new york city all the time, and have never seen anything like this. at one point, i thought maybe it was a sky crane with a boxy payload, or chinook helicopter blurred by clouds.  it had to be at least that big.  i thought a blimp, but it didn't have curved edges at all as you can see in the picture.

this is my first post of this sort although i follow ufo reports in the media and find the topic interesting.  i'm posting this just to see if anybody else saw this, or maybe could check out the pictures with better equipment.  the photos were taken with a standard iphone 4s.

the object looked to be the size of small single family house.
content.summary: Saw a large box like object moving vary slowly in the sky in southern direction lost sight of it briefly because of trucks/bridge structure.  it seemed to disappear momentarily.  then i saw it again in approximately the same place but moving north

content.detailedDescription:
Esta foi a minha experiência com ovni triangular, espero contribuir !
esse relato enviei ao site: ([link moved to fi section/cms/tg]) no dia 07.04.2014, alguns dias depois de tomar coragem em tocar no assunto, levei um mês para contar aos amigos mais chegados, pois tinha medo de ser taxado de louco, bem agora tenho mais informações sobre o assunto, mas ainda a minha mente luta em me dizer que não há logica no que eu vi, no que senti e sinto até hoje é inexplicável !
"a história aconteceu na madrugada do 13/03/2014 as 0:35 hs, e estou transtornado, não sei o que pensar, o cérebro luta com o que vimos, com o seu lado racional e cético (pois até o ocorrido não acreditava em onvis, ets e etc…), mas tenho dois vídeos gravados do ovni….Nunca pensei na minha vida que iria ver o que vi….Bem vou tentar resumir:
eu e meu amigo ale (alessandro), estávamos indo nesta madruga para a fazenda dele no interior de carazinho, no qual em certa parte da estrada paramos perto de uma ponte entre são bento e tesouras (interior de carazinho) para mijar e ai começamos a olhar para o céu a contemplar a lua e a estrela, pois estava bem claro o céu, sem nuvens e com a lua quase cheia.
logo após algum tempo, começamos a falar como estava lindo o céu, nomeamos algumas estrelas, e constelações, tipo olha o cruzeiro do sul, as 3 marias, e etc…, foi aí que me deu uma sensação que estávamos sendo vigiados, pensei logo que era algum animal (cão ou algum animal selvagem) fiquei de costa para o meu amigo tentando ver algo no meio de um mato que tinha ao lado da estrada, foi ai que o meu amigo foi em direção da ponte, pois tínhamos passado por ela e parado uns 10 metros a frente e ele queria olhar o nível do rio, essas coisa de granjeiro gosta de analisar… então ele foi à direção da ponte, e eu estava de costa olhando para dentro mato, tentando ver alguma coisa, enquanto o meu amigo se aproximava da ponte, foi ai que do nada surgiu “o grito”, um urro horrível, como um animal feroz e grande, tipo um leão na jaula, mas um urro era de susto ou de ameaça, (não era cão, pois estamos acostumado com latido de cachorros, lobos guarás, graxains, etc…mas o urro foi uma coisa que eu nunca ouvimos antes, um coisa assustadora demais, eu só gritei para o ale:- corre, vamos sair daqui, já pulando para dentro do carro, sem ao menos olhar para traz (não tive coragem de olhar no momento), o ale veio correndo e entrou dentro carro, e disse que não viu nada, só claro ouvido o grito assustador que estava na sua direção, mas disse que vinha da ponte. assim fizemos o retorno e fomos na direção da ponte , foi ai que vimos os olhos brilhando no escuro de alguma criatura tipo 1.30 m de altura, com os olhos grandes e brilhando conforme o farol do carro se aproximava, e ficou claro que a criatura ficou encarando-nos, enquanto se aproximávamos da ponte. quando chegamos na ponte a criatura foi adentro do mato, sem podermos identificar o que era , só podemos ver que era bípede de olhos grandes e brilhante e aproximadamente 1,30m de altura. mas não foi só isso…
o que realmente foi fantástico, inacreditável, e surreal foi o que aconteceu alguns minutos depois desse fato, estamos apavorados e comentando o que tinha acontecido momentos antes e nessa altura estamos voltando para carazinho, pois não tínhamos coragem de seguir para fazenda, foi que após percorrermos alguns km voltando, já quase em carazinho ( entre são bento e carazinho), foi que avistei um brilho no céu, primeiramente parecia um avião, ou um helicóptero (este ultimo nunca vi nessas bandas e tem o seu som característico), mas o brilho foi aumentando, e sem som com diversas luzes (vermelhas, azuis e brancas) e notei que a ovni estava parado , tipo nos esperando na estrada a cima dela uns 20 metros de altura, fomos diminuindo a velocidade para ver o que era (só de me lembrar agora já me arrepio ), o onvi era triangular de uns 50 metros (era enorme), essa altura estava tentando filmar com o meu celular desde o momento que eu avistei a luz no céu, no horizonte, mas meu celular não gravou nada, não sei se foi pelo pavor ou alguma interferência da coisa, ali pairando no ar, (sem som algum, tipo de motor ), bem ai peguei o celular do ale e tentando filmar o ovni, a essa altura a coisa estava sobre nos na estrada e nós parado em baixo (aos berros e pedindo a deus ajuda, apavorados), (me arrepiei de novo, cruz credo), estava filmando com a cabeça para fora da janela do carro, foi aí que o ovni, tipo ligou os motores, digamos que era motores, sei lá o que era… as luzes começaram a piscar e trocar de cor, muito rapidamente, eu pensei na hora “já era cara, tamo fu, a coisa ou vai mandar um raio e nos desintegrar ou vai nos abduzir ” mas então a coisa fez um barulho muito forte, como já disse tipo ligando alguma coisa e com as luzes brilhando, piscando e trocando de cor, saiu dali zunindo, voando com um rapidez incrível, lembrando que o coisa estava sobre nos, pairando , sem fazer nem um tipo de som , até ligar esses motores (não sei ao certo, acho que era os motores da coisa). bem nessa altura estávamos apavorados, tremendo, sem compreender o que era coisa voadora, que nos esperava na estrada, apos o contato com o “bicho” visto minutos antes. não sei se os dois fatos estão interligados, sei que foi uma coincidência muito grande, bem tenho dois vídeos das luzes, pois não consegui gravar no modo noturno, no momento estava apavorado e o celular não era o meu e não sabia mexer direito, mas tenho a gravação….
bem fomos para a minha casa tentar baixar no computador os vídeos e contar aos nossos familiares o ocorrido, pesquisei na net e vi que tem vários relatos, fotos, vídeos e desenho de ovnis triangulares semelhantes o que vimos.
bem estou até agora apavorado, e não consigo parar de pensar no que vimos….Mas ta gravado, por isso, sei que não foi alucinação, foi real, foi real….Não consegui dormir até agora….(levei dois dias para conseguir dormir).
tenho muito mais detalhes de coisas que vimos e sentimos que não sei me expressar agora….
abraços e até….
marcos klein"
tem o meu relato verbal e comentário do sr. fabio del santoro no programa vozes do universo do dia 30.05.2014 = pvu 196 ([link moved to fi section/cms/tg]) essa pagina demora para carregar, pois tem muitos programas, esperem se forem acessar.
os videos estão no youtube, que me refiro são estes , mas estes [links moved to fi section/cms/tg]
bem tentamos gravar com dois celulares no momento, mas só um gravou, este que gravou, pensei que tinha mais de 3 mim. de gravação, mas não sei se pelo pavor ou por interferencial da nave ou manipulação do vídeos por "eles", só apareceu 28 seg. no 1º video , isso foi instantes após a nave ter pairado em cima do carro, o 2º vídeos tem 2 seg. aparece a luz branca de relance quando a nave sai voando muito rapidamente... 
mandei esse videos para a revista ufo e eles me responderam:
"olá, marcos!
o que mais se destaca nos vídeos são as luzes azuis e vermelhas do painel de instrumentos do veículo. se o objeto a que você se refere é a pequena luz branca que aparece por uma fração de segundo no vídeo mais curto (ovni_2), então sinto informar que, devido a extrema exiguidade de pixels correspondentes ao objeto (muito pequeno), este vídeo não apresenta condições técnicas de uma análise mais acurada.
muitos dos casos que nos chegam são assim mesmo, ou seja, na ansiedade de capturar e enfocar um objeto que se afasta e se move rapidamente, as filmagem obtidas perdem demais quanto as condições técnicas para um exame.
nestes casos, vale muito mais relato das testemunhas do que a imagem captada, sondo o vídeo considerado como "sem condições técnicas de exame"!
espero contribuir e ajuda (e ajudar) no sentido de conseguir entender melhor essa experiência, compartilhando esses fatos !
abçs a todos !
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Primeiro contato com um ser tipo gray depois fomos seguidos e acompanhados na estrada e apos pirou sobre ela a nossa espera , vimos a nave triangular acima de nós a poucos metros.

content.detailedDescription:
1. room looking out window.
2. looking at the stars
3. aliens
4. loops, swirls, communication, vivid pictures/radio frequencies, sounds, nature, dogs, birds, planes, ufo with 6-8 light bulbs, disks, etc.
5. we are not alone and there are many other forms of life,planets, things, robots, galaxies, etc.
6. family distractions
content.summary: Interested and ready for progress

content.detailedDescription: I was walking outside to get my charger out of my car around 1am. once i was in the parking lot, i decided to look up at the completely clear sky. as soon as i looked up, i saw a pinkish/redish light or close cluster of lights move across the sky in a smooth, fluid motion. it did not fly straight, but maintained a steady course in the same general direction (left to right). it seemed to move in a very long almost "s" shaped pattern, more like the function x^3. it was moving too fast to be an airplane and the lights did not blink. i only witnessed it for about 4-6 seconds before it was too far away to see. the lights were very high above me. more than a mile. it wasn't too frightening, but it was slightly unresting. i recently have been watching documentaries about ufos and seeing this made me uncomfortable.
content.summary: Walked outside and saw pinkish light move across sky in subtle

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Just a handful of unidentifiable lights moving through the new mexico sky. captured 8:23pm saturday january 17 2015 via an iphone 6 unedited nor enhanced. i saw them in the sky while i was on my way home. they were orange or maybe reddish at some moments, there were about 8-10 of them moving through the sky north to south but they did not seem to all disappear out of view towards the same point as planes do toward a runway. they were bright lights seemingly traveling together faster than i've seen helicopters. after the initial group disappeared out of view another 3 moved followed.
content.summary: ~8 lights traveling across the nm sky

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home in the late evening and made a turn on a road towards the west. i noticed up above me a glowing, moving object moving quickly towards the south. as i drove to the next block while still looking up, i noticed another glowing object following in the same path. both objects appeared yellowish orange in color, had blinking lights on what appeared to be the sides, and, in general sparkled like flares. they were separated by at least 500 to 1000 feet or more, depending on their altitude. they appeared to be under the heavy cloud cover. after a minute or so, the first one changed direction at an arc towards the southwest and eventually either dissipated or became invisible. about 40 seconds later the second object also changed direction towards the southwest and eventually appeared to dissipate. i assumed that both were flares but, it did not seem like a bad idea to compare notes with others who may have experienced this event.
content.summary: Driving home i witnessed two lights like flares flying over mem bending towards the southwest and eventually appearing to dissipate with a rumble following.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside watering the plants, it was a beautiful day.  i was standing on the south side of my house.  i looked up and saw 30 to 40 silverish-white balloon shaped objects moving very slowly down the center of my street. 
they were heading in a northern direction.  i could hardly wrap my head around what i was seeing!
these balloon looking objects were all bunched together tightly, aprox. 
5'high & about 20'long and about 10'to 15' off the ground.  they floated smoothly all together as if it was a solid object. 
i couldn't believe my eyes.   my mind was racing, how can balloons float sideways?  and what are balloon looking things doing floating down my street?  as it past by i moved closer to the fence to get a better look, then i ran to the end of the fence to see more of it.  the roof of my house blocked the view, i lost visual contact.
i then ran through the house, out the front door to the northern side of the yard and out into the street.  whatever it was, was gone. i was in shock and awe and disappointed that i had not seen more.
content.summary: Silver / white balloon shaped objects

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home in the late evening and made a turn on a road towards the west. i noticed up above me a glowing, moving object moving quickly towards the south. as i drove to the next block while still looking up, i noticed another glowing object following in the same path. both objects appeared yellowish orange in color, had blinking lights on what appeared to be the sides, and, in general sparkled like flares. they were separated by at least 500 to 1000 feet or more, depending on their altitude. they appeared to be under the heavy cloud cover. after a minute or so, the first one changed direction at an arc towards the southwest and eventually either dissipated or became invisible. about 40 seconds later the second object also changed direction towards the southwest and eventually appeared to dissipate. i assumed that both were flares but, it did not seem like a bad idea to compare notes with others who may have experienced this event.
content.summary: Driving home i witnessed two lights like flares flying over mem bending towards the southwest and eventually appearing to dissipate with a rumble following.

content.detailedDescription: Was driving on route 4 near lebanon il around 2200 hrs when i observed a ufo round hovering between tree breaks and after like 20 seconds i was still driving and lost sight of it....All i know but it was not no airplane although scott afb is only like 6-8 miles away
content.summary: Round with red lights hovering then lost track of it

content.detailedDescription: This sighting occurred when i was 17. i am now 39 years old and will never forget it. i was helping my brother-in-law work on the roof of his trailer that evening. i was facing south and he was directly across from me facing north. i just simply looked up from my work and seen the craft hovering approximately 60 yards in front of me directly over the tygart river. it was round, metallic and had squared corners that stepped down from the top to sides. had no visible windows but it had multicolored lights on it that dimmed and brightened. these lights did not cast on anything around the object or the object itself. it made absolutely no noise at any time. immediately upon seeing it i just stared at it. it was as if time had frozen. i had stopped working but my brother-in-law never noticed during my viewing of the object. i could not take my eyes off it. all i would have had to do was tell him to look behind him but i was unable to do that. not out of fear. i was strangely calm. at no time before, during, or after the sighting have i experienced fear as a result of the sighting. i just watched it hover for it seemed like 5 minutes and it slowly started drifting down the river. it went behind some treetops and never emerged. i saw something occur behind the trees but not sure what. i just knew it was gone at that point. at that point everything was normal again. i could move and just began working again. i could not tell my brother-in-law what had happened. something wouldn't let me. i remembered it a lot but never spoke of it for years until i told my sister and then later my wife. besides this report that is the only people i've ever shared it with. i felt controlled throughout the entire viewing. its a very hard feeling to describe. this object was very large and very close to me. i see it as clearly today as i did when i first saw it. the thing that puzzles me the most was the feeling of control it had over me. it was so peaceful. the best i can describe it would be like freezing a moment in time except for yourself and the object and being able to focus on everything around you at your leisure while time is on pause. it sounds strange but it happened. i don't know why i was aloud to experience it, but its something i will never forget. the dates are approximate on this but it was definitely summer of 1993. i remember that because it was right before my scheduled date to leave for basic training in the u.S. army.
content.summary: Large disk like object with lights hovering with no sound lights visible but did not project from craft.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i exited our front door around 6:15pm and it was still daylight. we walked south on the porch to driveway where our auto was parked.  we normally look in the trees for birds, etc. when we both saw this huge object hovering right above us and just above our two story home, probably 10-15ft.  my first thought was,it's a blimp, but there was no noise and there wasnt any movement. we both looked at each other in wonder, than looked back at the object and it was gone.
i ran from the porch to the street to get a view of the sky looking south and it could no longer be seen. this object was grey metalic with no markings or features. we really couldnt discribe the shape of the object as it was right above our heads and we were looking at its underside.
i am a retired law enforcement officer and my wife a retired nurse.  i am also an air force veteren and know about most aircraft and such.  this was no aircraft that i have ever seen.  i was like here, then gone.  like it disappeared.
content.summary: Big, solid and quiet

content.detailedDescription:
I was very young, indoors while my older sisters and a neighbor girl were outdoors and witnessed it completely while i only saw the aftermath.  they came running inside in terror and wouldn't go out the rest of the night.  it was reflective silver, cigar shaped, cruising smoothly over the trees lining the edge of the small remote lake.  afterwards, my oldest sister and i developed nosebleed problems, i had recurring dreams about "ugly old man doctors with big heads" and my sister later in life had a crystalline object removed from her arm.  despite the persistent dreams i would have about the "ugly doctors" and thinking i saw a grey in the mirror when i would first look into it at my own reflection (no idea what that was about), i was not exposed to images of greys until i was 8, (4 years later).  even before puberty i began to have recurring dreams about the daughter i was supposed to have when i grew up, who would be able to talk at birth, but this newborn baby had scary dark eyes.  
i eventually did have a daughter and while bright, she wasn't talking at birth (whew).  then one day when she was 3 years old, she told me the "white" alien people had taken her and me the night before, and they let her pet a yak and an alligator and were very nice to her but she wasn't too happy with how they made me "messy" and she pointed to a place on my upper left chest.
to the best of my knowledge, she hadn't seen any movies or materials that would make her imagine such a scenario.  but then again, both she and her brother born after her have had uncanny talent for knowing precise details about what they did not and could not have seen.
i don't know what to make of all of it, other than there's more under heaven than is dreamt of in our philosophies.
content.summary: Large cigar-shaped reflective craft flew smoothly and silently just over the trees around sunset and continued out of sight.

content.detailedDescription: I was at lake lanier in buford georgia, i was going to start my grill but never did. i was looking up at the stars capella and gemini in the northeast. there was a huge white light between capella and castor. my first thought was jupiter was below pollux and this was three times the size of jupiter. so i watched to see if it was an oncoming plane headed directly toward me. it was not moving, or getting any closer. so i grabbed my cell phone and hit goggle sky map to see if it was a possible satellite. while i was waiting for cell to upload a bright green light appeared on the left side of this huge light that was not jupiter. if using the white light as penny size out there than the bright green light was the size of capella. using the extended arm for degrees the green light was one degree from the huge white light. while changing my cell from goggle sky to camera the green light moved from left to right and disappeared into the white light. the white light absorbed the green light before i could take a picture both lights immediately disappeared, instantly all gone, no trails just turned off their lights gone! i watched the sky hoping to spot the lights again for fifteen minutes the lights were gone. i feel lucky to have witnessed this six minute happening and would truly like to know if anyone else has documented it.
content.summary: I witnessed two lights one huge white light one small green light hovering and then watched the green light be absorbed by the white light

content.detailedDescription:
I discovered by accident the object in the christmas eve 1968 "earthrise" pictures when the apollo was orbiting the moon. i had enlarged the picture to look at the stars in the background of the picture and saw this object at about the 8 o'clock position about halfway between the earth and surface of the moon. as this picture is 46 years old, i couldn't believe it hasn't been spotted before but research i've done finds no mention of it at all. i took the section of the picture and enlarged it and worked on it with windows live photo to lighten it and try to bring out some more details. i have since found an object in the same place in other photos of the earthrise in the same location. it looks different in other photos like perhaps it had rotated between pictures. the other pictures were taken a little earlier in the orbit than the original i was working with as the earth is closer to the horizon of the moon. looking on the 'net for other pictures taken at that time shows some have no stars in the background and those don't have the object either but all the pictures i've looked at with the stars in the background have this object.
i'm very curious if this has ever been noted before and i was just unable to find the references to it.
content.summary: Object in christmas eve 1968

content.detailedDescription:
I was asleep in bed when i heard what i believed to be a truck in the distance, the type of low rumble that sometimes lightly vibrates window panes. i looked at the clock and it was about 2:05 am, and my ears were surveying the truck sound as my mind began to wonder, while my body wanted sleep. where is this truck and why is it idling outside my house or at a distance was all i could think.

after a few minutes of listening i realized a logical pattern to the hum, and recognized it was something else. id like to mention i am an audio engineer by former trade and with schooling to match, with a lot of time spent playing with synthesizers and sounds all sorts of gear, which from these interests i was hooked and had to get out of my bed to start listening some more. i was absolutely thrown for a loop and wide awake...

i put my ears to the walls in my room, i put my ears to my bedroom floor, i opened the windows, left ear first, right ear next, trying to localize the source, of course this is hard or impossible with low end, , i was simply could not understand what on earth is that sound. only thing i could imagine was a teenager with a keyboard and a high powered 2000 watt sub woofer that could produce low end energy of a jet plane, with finesse and subtly. the pattern was mechanical but also slightly natural feeling in its delivery, a feeling of intelligence and purpose.

for those who know audio the sound appeared to pitch up and down, in a defined pattern from about approx. 20-25hz to maybe 30-35hz, with a drone like quality, a slow ride up, a stop, then pitch down, it appeared to be reaching a area as wide as pasco county. it felt like it was coming from a source several hundred miles away and with a energy of massiveness, only due to my studies does my mind think in this way.

i decided i had enough and got dressed, this whole time i will say my hairs on my  body were standing up as though in fear or something just unknown, 

once outside my door i verified as best as my trained ears could do, that the sound was indeed coming from above, and was faint but also gigantic in presence, i know what it takes energetically to produce such a faint low rumble, to the un trained ear, its nothing, but this was no freggin joke. with less than a minute outside i tell you i ran back into my house in some sort of fear came over me, as though a voice was saying, go back inside. there was a eerie feeling in the air out there, add to it the air and i was starting to hear more layers to the sounds, lighter tones almost like a horn or a digereedoo. there is no reason for me to write this much but i want to see if others have experienced this. 

i wont add any further comments, for those who are skeptical skip this last bit.... i consider myself psychic / empath in a humbled un-said, un ego driven way. i sense and do receive words and images from other sides... and when i asked this night "what are you", what i gathered in response was that these sounds were a type of energetic work on the grids and lay-lines of earth and of a good nature.

after a hour of listening, i put earplugs in and still heard the lows through the ear plugs of course, slightly zapped and weird ed out i fell back asleep. ive been telling everyone i know, but nobody gives a [verbiage removed/cms/rjl], and i look like a lunatic.
content.summary: Strange low frequency sounds coming from sky

content.detailedDescription: I was headed north to work and noticed something to west/southwest direction and pulled into the church to take a look.  i had noticed to objects that looked like fire balls heading in a southern direction.  one was training  ways behind the other and both had taken on a horizontal path almost.  as i was watching them i noticed a third object just appear out of nowhere high in the sky like it was just dropped.  it was going fast and also left a trial behind it.  i video taped and snapped pictures of the three for a while and noticed a 4th one appear in the sky but this one was heading north instead of south.  as i was snapping a picture and before i could change it back to video i watched it doe some kind of a half flip turn upwards and over flip and then was now facing in the southern direction like the other 3.  the first 2 had gotten to far for me to watch so i focused on the last 2.  as the third one kept moving i could see it take on a more straight horizontal path and the tail behind it was getting shorter and then it was like morphing into a sphere that had a glow around it and just pretty much stopped and hovered in place.  while that was going on the 4th one kept dropping in altitude and could see it start to take a slight curve into a straighter line on its path. the 3rd one was still just hovering in that same area and it seemed like as the 4th one got closer it was starting to light up more like its flames or tail was starting to get longer again and then when the 4th one got to a close enough point the 3rd one starting moving slowly and in a southern direction still then after a few minutes of me watching it it just vanished out of site and i was moving the camera around to locate it but couldn't see it anywhere so i stopped and headed to work.  the 4th one had moved behind the tree lines and i just seen a orange glow that kept moving when i stopped taping.  my brother said its a meteor but a meteor wouldn't go from a falling diagonal path to a horizontal path and it would just stop traveling hover in place and just be a white sphere and then light up brighter and then take off or as with the 4th one a meteor would not change its direction and go the opposite direction of the way it came in falling into the atmosphere.  he obviously didn't look at the videos i shot. i also had trouble getting it to focus because the powerless were in my way and it kept wanting to focus more on the closer object. the videos are kind of shaky because the camera was heavy with the 500 mm lens on it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw 4 so called fire balls in the western sky

content.altitude: Landed, Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)

peoples are being murdered in order to keep this information hidden so the "organized crime bosses" can continue to leach off of those who are coming to us- website is: [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]  you will see some of the objects take the form of what i believe that our most ancients saw when they reached in spirit and connected with the "garden of eden". you will see what i mean. the most recent sighting was last summer when i was watching and photographing some birds that took flight and changed form right in front of me. it is really quite amazing. you will see that more is explained on this site that i made for my belated husbands ([]) brother [names removed/cms/tg]]- seriously...As you will see when you go to site.

content.detailedDescription:
Hi guys,

traveling from dallas to austin this last sunday (1/18/2014) an object caught my attention because it was significantly higher in altitude than normal airplanes/contrails and as i watched it appeared also move much faster than any aircraft i’ve seen.  as my wife began watching with me we saw another object, and both craft were projecting upwards as they went.  very suddenly one of the objects abruptly and sharply changed directions going almost directly up and completely exited the atmosphere (in about 1-2 seconds) and the second followed shortly after.  my wife was able to snap a few photos with my iphone before they disappeared.

i searched the web and found many photos similar to the ones we took.  feel free to contact me to discuss.

thoughts?
content.summary: Two fast high-flying objects crossed from nw to se and then abruptly ascended out of atmosphere.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I pulled out of my apt to see a drone type plane fly away from the sighting prior to me seeing it. but it didn't look like the normal military drone. looked like small plane but with only red slow flashing lights. it was a lot smaller than a plane and closer to the ground. then i drove to the stop light, maybe 100 feet from my apt, and i saw a diagonal line of 3 "big" star shaped (circlish) lights hovering. then all of a sudden they darted across the sky. going to the left side of my car.  it moved very quickly. basically just saw a flash of light trail and they were gone. 
i thought at first it was stars but they were too big and too close to the ground to be stars. i was very shocked and curious when this happened.
content.summary: Diagonal line. then shooted across sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was visiting my brother in london and one of the days we decided to go outside london and tour the cotswalds region. our last day was in bath and we planned to visit the landmards, the first one was the royal crescent and we even went inside in no1 royal crescent (a museum like preserved house, part of the entire crescent).
we walked among the rooms on the first floor and then we went to the ones on the second floor.
using of camera and taking photos was forbidden everywhere inside the rooms.
in the gentelman's room on the second floor was an open window, then i asked the attendant whether i can take a photo from this window to the royal crescent from outside and she agreed.
then i photographed the building exterior from this open window.
this is the picture where i think there is an ufo on it and it can be clearly seen over the building.
i am submitting it along with this report.
at the time when i was taking the shot i did not see these lights.
i shoot in raw format and after 3 months i processed the raw image and saw these strange lights.
at first i thought it was a reflection of what looks like a chandelier but when i go back in my mind i realize that this might hardly happen at the spot where i was shooting.
remember i was shooting from a second floor room, from an open window to the outside. these lights in my humble opinion could not be reflected from inside the room.
i am sorry that i can't remember whether there was a chandolier in the room and whether it was the same shape, i could take picture inside the room. i tried to find it out online but could find any pictures of the room's lighting, only a couple of picture on the other side of the room.

i don't see any chandolier on them and can't remember where and what were the lights.

i am sending you the original raw file without any manipulation.

i never noticed the lights live, i noticed them when i was looking closely on this photo several months later.

all the above information i gave in the report is based on the lights of the photo (positioning, distance, shape).

i would really like you to examine this photo and tell me whether i saw something or there is another explanation. the lights are on the upper right side on the picture.

i don't claim this is a real ufo but i don't have another explanation (except reflections from inside the room but i really find this hard to happen).
content.summary: Took a picture of royal crescent in bath and didn't notice anyhing, then after downloading it from my camera i saw the strange lights.

content.detailedDescription:
In that time i was 10 year old.
i and my brother we were returning from the circus shou,abouth 22h.
on the half of my street,we noticed an object that approaches us in the sky.
we stop and look on it.
that whas disk shape craft,with various lights arround it.
that craft are flaying without any sound.
it flew over the housis.
we saw it clearly.
that whas classic flying saucer.
we just looked at each other and ran toward the house frantically scared.
content.summary: Disk with varios lights in circle.

content.detailedDescription:
I usually take earliy morning walks for exercise (3am to 5am). this particular morning i left my house at around 3am. i returned home at around 4am. i'd usually walk to the back of my house (patio) to rest before going inside. i was resting against my rod ironed fence looking up into the night sky which was a picture purfect clear sky. while looking almost streight up i noticed a small light moviing rapidly in different directions. moving just like a water bug across the surface of the water. moving in a quick rapid motion but confined to a small area. i'd never seen anything like it before. i was clued to this thing! at first when i saw it i thought i was seeing things and looked away then back again to make sure i wasn't. 

i was raised around aircraft. my father was af and so was i. whatever this thing was it wasn't man made.

this happened in 2008. why am i now just telling this to anyone? i couldn't get it out of my mind. i had to tell someone.
content.summary: A dot. a lighted dot. a lighted dot that moved like a water bug in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were out walking a trail in a state park photographing different flora and fauna.
after viewing photo of a palm leaf an orb was noticed in the upper right corner.
this orb is multi-colored and left a trail.
content.summary: Orb appeared in photograph

content.detailedDescription:
So first off understand that i have nothing to do with this as a witness to this incident, or anything to do with the people involved, but i am only reporting this as i would like to know more about it myself, and the fact that possibly it was never reported or thoroughly investigated. perhaps it was, and mufon has already investigated this, i don't know that, but just putting this out there in case it was not.

several years back i saw a video online of what was showing two mysterious objects hovering and floating around above a field and trees. originally, to my recollection the video was unedited, and had several portions of the video where the objects were no longer visible from sight. the video was nearly 12-15 minutes long in its entirety. the comments on the video were of the most part negative, claiming the objects to merely be tractors. i agree with the fact the arrangement of lighting does look like that of a tractor. but the way the objects float and seemingly dance around definitely gives one the impression that these objects are not on the ground, but hovering through the air.

it was probably days, perhaps weeks later, when i had went back to view the video to find the original replaced with a shorter, edited video, showing a brief analysis of the video, which showed to prove that the objects were actually hovering in the sky as opposed to driving on the ground.

i know the above states to not include a url link, but i am doing so to show the video it is that i am referring to. again please note, i do not know the parties involved with this video! i am sending this report to you, because i myself would like to know more about it, and the fact that there are no other ufo videos out there, that truly give me the goosebumps more than this video itself.

i myself really believe the video and objects to be genuine. what they are? i have no clue, but it honestly scares the crap out of me, and most the folks i show it to are generally creeped out as well.

the video can be seen here: [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]

thanks for taking the time to review my concern of this topic. i really appreciate it, and look forward to hearing back from you in the near future.

thank you so much!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two objects with lights hovering and moving around above a field and trees.

content.detailedDescription: Were sat on a beach with my partner when we saw what we thought was a helicopter taking off and flying over the sky. it was moving a bit fast and then we noticed it wasn't making any sound so took a few photos,. when we got home and looked at the photos we had a bit of a shock as it seemed to be a line of fire that changed shape. the object just seemed to fly over us then off into the distant.
content.summary: Thoought it was a solid light but changed shape

content.detailedDescription: I was in the backyard trying to spot the comet lovejoy. i was setting in a zero gravity lawn chair with a patio steel chair sitting in front of me to steady my binoculars on for better viewing of the comet. i could see satellites, and airplanes, but no comet. about frustrated enough with my inability to find what i was looking for my girlfriend came outside to see how i was doing and to let me know dinner was almost done and that obama was giving his speech and talking about 2 years of free college.(a good time reference). i shrugged her comments off and expressed my frustrations with not being able to find this comet, pointing out where i believed it was and where i was told it would be, pointing things out in the sky. i pointed out the star formation pleiades and then i pointed out a satellite close by and started scanning all sky for more things i could point out to her. gazing into the northwest, something caught my eye. my thought process went as follows satellite, shooting stars, to an actual object bigger than i have ever seen before. screaming look look look with each look becoming a greater higher pitch scream. i was seeing 5 lights in a v shape pattern closely followed by 6 or 7 lights of the same frequency and size. the v shape was one single large object, dark enough to see through the clouds and blocking starlight as it passed. it was amazing and short lived. remembering that i had my binoculars on me i raised to get a better look but was unsuccessful. the lights were dim, but put off a haze or a slight glow. it was fast and there was a plane just below the object as it passed. please don't get me wrong this object was nowhere near the plane and traveled at a much much faster pace. man, the v shape was jaw dropping when i could make out the full object! i couldn't make out what the other lights were but just lights traveling at the same pace not far behind. it seemed to be traveling west to north spotting in the northwest at about 45 degrees of the horizon. when it had gone out of sight i turn to my girlfriend and asked did you see it, did you see it? to her reply, my eyes aren't adjusted do you mean the shooting star, i think i just saw the one, i'm sorry. what a let down. even if i had my camera on my phone rolling i don't think i would have got much but i would do anything to get a better look at it all over again. i stood outside waiting, watching for anything as a desperate hope to see it again, but nothing. i went inside and got online expecting it to be all over the internet. others had to see this, others had to be doing exactly what i was doing, looking for the stupid comet.
content.summary: Reminds me of the 1997 phoenix lights.5 making the v and multiple lights fallowing

content.detailedDescription:
my girlfriend and i were in my bedroom watching tv. my mother was in the living room. i turned and looked out my window(that was open)and saw two round glowing orbs of amber fire in formation coast by my house. my girlfriend saw the other two in the distance. we took pictures and some video. all three of us saw them. the 5th really freaked me out a little cause it seemed to hang out above me for a minute. then like the first four. it took of to the south with the others. the weird thing is, the picture we have . you can see both our faces in it. even though the window was open and there was no possibility for reflection !! called the police and had an officer here to document the sighting. police report filed 

 our pictures and video were taken on and old phone so i cannot post them unfortunately. they can only be witnessed in person.
content.summary: 5 bright round orbs of amber fire with no sound very fast headed south past my house.
